verses.text: \w First|strong="G4413"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w I|strong="G3767"\w* \w ask|strong="G3870"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w petitions|strong="G1783"\w*, \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w*, \w intercessions|strong="G1783"\w*, \w and|strong="G3767"\w* \w thanksgivings|strong="G2169"\w* \w should|strong="G3956"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* offered \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w*,

especially \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w kings|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w high|strong="G3956"\w* positions, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w order|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w lead|strong="G1236"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w quiet|strong="G2272"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* peaceful \w life|strong="G1236"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* deeply religious \w and|strong="G2532"\w* reverent \w spirit|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* acceptable \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* eyes \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*,

\w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w should|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* attain \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w full|strong="G3956"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* truth.

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w mediator|strong="G3316"\w* \w between|strong="G3316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* humanity – \w the|strong="G2532"\w* human, \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*,

\w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w as|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G1325"\w* ransom \w on|strong="G5228"\w* \w behalf|strong="G5228"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w This|strong="G3588"\w* \w must|strong="G3588"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w our|strong="G3956"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w*, \w as|strong="G1438"\w* opportunities present \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3739"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w myself|strong="G1473"\w* \w appointed|strong="G5087"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* herald \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* apostle (\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1473"\w* \w telling|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* simple truth \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w lie|strong="G5574"\w*) – \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w teacher|strong="G1320"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* truth.

\w My|strong="G1722"\w* \w desire|strong="G1014"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G3588"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* custom everywhere \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w lead|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4336"\w*, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* reverently uplifted, avoiding heated controversy.

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* desire \w that|strong="G2532"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w should|strong="G2532"\w* \w adorn|strong="G2885"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* appropriate dress, worn quietly \w and|strong="G2532"\w* modestly, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* wreaths \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w gold|strong="G5553"\w* ornaments \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w hair|strong="G4117"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w pearls|strong="G3135"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w costly|strong="G4185"\w* \w clothing|strong="G2441"\w*,

\w but|strong="G3739"\w* – \w as|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w proper|strong="G4241"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* profess \w to|strong="G1135"\w* \w be|strong="G3739"\w* religious – \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w good|strong="G1223"\w* \w actions|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w They|strong="G3956"\w* \w must|strong="G1135"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w*, listening \w quietly|strong="G2271"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G1722"\w* teachers \w and|strong="G1135"\w* showing \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* deference.

\w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w do|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* consent \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w* becoming teachers, \w or|strong="G3761"\w* exercising authority \w over|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G1722"\w*; \w they|strong="G1161"\w* ought \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w make|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* fuss.
Adam \w was|strong="G4111"\w* \w formed|strong="G4111"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, not \w Eve|strong="G2096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* Adam \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w deceived|strong="G1818"\w*; \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* entirely \w deceived|strong="G1818"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fell|strong="G1096"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* sin.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w she|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* birth \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w child|strong="G1722"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* never abandon \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, love, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* holiness, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* behave \w with|strong="G3326"\w* modesty.
